events.title: Senior Rust Developer
events.description: Led development of CLI and TUI applications for system monitoring and automation. Improved performance and user experience through Rust optimizations.
highlights: Reduced memory usage by 40% through custom data structures
Implemented cross-platform terminal rendering with Ratatui
Mentored 4 junior developers in Rust best practices

events.title: Frontend Team Lead
events.description: Managed a team of 6 developers building modern web applications with TypeScript and React. Established coding standards and review processes.
highlights: Delivered major dashboard redesign project ahead of schedule
Reduced bundle size by 35% through code splitting and lazy loading
Implemented comprehensive UI testing strategy

events.title: Full Stack Developer
events.description: Developed and maintained web applications using Node.js backend and React frontend. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and testing frameworks.
highlights: Built RESTful API service that handled 500k+ daily requests
Improved application load time by 60% through optimizations
Introduced GraphQL for more efficient data fetching

events.title: Software Engineer

highlights: Developed iOS and Android apps using React Native
Implemented PWA features for offline functionality
Created API integrations with third-party services

events.title: Junior Developer
events.description: Started career building websites and small web applications. Gained experience with frontend and backend technologies.
highlights: Built and maintained company website
Developed custom CMS solution for small businesses
Created responsive email templates

education.description: Graduated with honors. Focused on software engineering and web technologies.

education.description: Part-time studies focusing on distributed systems and cloud computing.
